items.title: Real-time Team Collaboration
items.description: Enable multiple team members to view, create, and update tasks in real-time within shared projects.
acceptance_criteria: Multiple users can simultaneously edit task details without data loss
Changes made by one user are visible to others within 2 seconds
Users can assign tasks to specific team members
System maintains an activity log of changes with timestamps and user IDs
non_functional: System should support at least 100 concurrent users without performance degradation
Real-time updates should have latency under 2 seconds

notes: The requirement is high-level; assumptions made about real-time updates, concurrent editing, and activity logging. Further clarification needed on integrations, platforms, and offline support.
